Define Documentation

#define TOUCH_INIT_DEFAULT
Value:
{ 500000,                /* 500kHz sampling frequency */             \
    1,                     /* Ignore moves not greater than 1 pixel */ \
    adcOvsRateSel128,      /* Oversampling 128 times */                \
  }
